text: @realDonaldTrump I am a Public Health professional. This is not sound policy. We have national and state Pandemic Plans, that have been developed by the leaders in multiple fields. We are not following the guidance of experts. This Pandemic has been expected and planned for. Listen, please.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
